TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptingAuthenticationServiceSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection

Docs.summary: Represents the configuration section for authentication service settings. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingAuthenticationServiceSection> class enables you to programmatically access and modify the `authenticationService` element of the configuration section for using AJAX functionality in ASP.NET.
The authentication service for AJAX-enabled applications only works with forms-based authentication that uses cookies to exchange user information. For more information about Forms Authentication, see [Using Forms Authentication with Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c50f7dc5-323c-4c63-b4f3-96edfc1e815e).
## Examples The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingAuthenticationServiceSection> class.
``` <system.web.extensions> <scripting> <webServices> <authenticationService enabled="true" requireSSL="false" /> </webServices> </scripting> </system.web.extensions> ```
The following example demonstrates how to access <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingAuthenticationServiceSection> programmatically.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Configuration/CS/App_Code/ConfigSectionSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Configuration/VB/App_Code/ConfigSectionSample.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication service is enabled for an application that uses AJAX features of ASP.NET.
Docs.value: if the authentication service is enabled; otherwise, . The default is .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication service requires an SSL-secured connection.
Docs.value: if the authentication service requires Secure Sockets Layer (SSL); otherwise, . The default is .
